column4: The following link is a great resource: http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/index.php
And an 11.04 specific, once you've got it installed: http://www.webupd8.org/2011/04/things-to-tweak-fix-after-installing.html
thanks, i'm comfortable from that point its just getting the partitions setup to install it
I think you'll have to format one of those partitions to ext3/ext4 to properly install ubuntu.
